name: Roy Speed Ross
tag_list: globali, auto-theft-prevention, theft-deterent, vehicle-identification, vehicle-recovery, theft-deterrent, law-enforcement, uv-identification, vehicle-marking
overview:
Roy Speed and Ross Ltd. (1998) is a leading manager and marketer of technology solutions for the Canadian retail automotive industry. Together with our strategic partners, our organization delivers proven systems, processes and support to assist our automotive member dealers in reaching their aggressive retail sales goals.

Roy Speed and Ross was originally formed to address a need for auto theft protection in the automotive retail industry. The safeguarding of the dealerships’ inventory, and in turn, transferring that protection to the consumer through a vehicle registration and recovery network, was trademarked as the globali.com Registration Fee Program®. Roy Speed and Ross has become Canadas recognized leader in vehicle theft prevention, protection and recovery, establishing strong relations with automotive associations and law enforcement organizations across Canada.
